userstatus-desc: Social status updates on user profiles and on network pages
userstatus-no-user: The user you are trying to view does not exist.
userstatus-nobody-agrees: No one agrees with this thought
userstatus-no-new-thoughts: There are no new thoughts. Add one!
userstatus-confirm-delete: Are you sure you want to delete this thought?
apihelp-userstatus-description: API for handling social status messages
apihelp-userstatus-summary: API for handling social status messages
apihelp-userstatus-param-what: What to do? Verb + subject, i.e. addnetworkstatus to add a status to a network page, deletestatus to delete a status message, etc.
apihelp-userstatus-param-count: Display this many status updates in the returned feed
apihelp-userstatus-param-vote: 1 to "upvote" a status message, -1 to "downvote" instead
